= Addons Path Configuration

This config section convert environment variable related to addons path configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$converters/addons_path.adoc[]


[[option_addons_path]]
== addons_path
NOTE: specify additional addons paths

Odoo cli used:

* --addons-path

The environment variable `ADDON_PATH` is xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_repeatable[repeatable]. +
This mean a suffix can be added after an **single** `_`.
For example `ADDON_PATH_value`, the suffix is `value` not `_value`
